help-file.title: PICK LOCKS
help-file.content:
Syntax: pick <door_name | container_name> Aggressive: No
You may use this skill for picking locks, but you should remember that not all locks can be picked. Also, lock picks tend to be very fragile. Bring an extra set. You MUST have a set of lock-picks to be able to attempt picking a lock.
Examples: > pick door > pick safe
